1.us session color
-DB
Treasuries finished mixed on Thursday with the curve power steepening around the 5yr note - 2s closed 2bp rich, while bonds cheapened 4bps as Bullard delivered dovish comments and the 30yr reopening tailed almost 2bps.  Volumes were 153% of recent averages.
周四t涨跌互现，曲线走陡，5yr到2s收高2bp，在Bullard发表了鸽派言论和30yr重开拍卖季度跌2bp之后债券则便宜了4bps。
Treasuries opened in NY largely unchanged having zig-zagged back and forth during the overnight session as the market swung from risk-off and back to risk-on.  Bullard's (noted Hawk and voting member) dovish speech in early NY time - he expressed concern about oil becoming 'worrisome' and inflation prospects - which supported the front end and started the curve on it's steepening trend.  We witnessed fast money buying and there was also a block buyer of 5k TYH6 after he made his remarks.  
Ny开盘T几乎没动，前个夜盘时段价格涨涨落落，市场逐渐从去风险转换到风险偏好。Ny早些时候Bullard（鹰派，投票委员）发布了其鸽派言论，他个人担心油价“令人担忧”且对通胀前景施压，支撑了前端买盘，驱动曲线走陡。我们看到有快钱买入，也看到有大买家在他发表言论时候买进5k TYH6
The market is now pricing a cumulative ~36bps of tightening in 2016.  Bullard's dovish tones eventually supported stocks, giving the street some comfort to start setting up for the afternoon 30yr reopening, which pulled treasuries lower and steeper.  Despite a meaningful concession on the curve and outright into the bidding deadline, the 30yr auction still tailed 1.7bps to stop at 2.905%.  Counter to the auctions earlier in the week, indirects were lower than normal, leaving dealers holding 32.7% of the allocation (compared to a recent average of 27.5%).  Corporate issuance was light on Thursday.  Our net flows were generally mixed.  
市场现在定价水准也就是2016年底差不多36bp的水准。Bullard的鸽派言论最终支撑了股市，使得街上也比较舒服得准备下午30yr的重新开卖，还使得t走低走陡。虽然出价截止前曲线和存量债券都显著回落，30yr的拍卖也就跌1.7bps，定价2.905%。不同于本周早些时候拍卖，间接买盘较往常要少，交易商拿了32.7%头寸（近期均值27.5%）。周四公司债发行很轻。我们的净客盘总体上买卖均衡。
We remain in 5/30s and 10/30s flatteners.
我们维持5/30s和10/30s走平头寸
 
2.
BC的内部讨论稿
GC discussion on euro area’s inflation outlook: the driver of monetary easing
Overall, taking into account all views expressed, there was broad agreement that, while euro area inflation was expected to pick up, there had been a further deterioration in the outlook for inflation, so that the return to inflation rates below, but close to, 2% would likely take longer than previously expected. The risks surrounding the outlook for HICP inflation were also assessed, on balance, to remain on the downside.
Ps:消费者物价调和指数（HICP）主要在欧盟范围内使用，是衡量消费者为商品和服务市场篮子所支付价格的指标。对各国采用相同方法计算，使通胀衡量指标具有可比性。年度（或月度）增长率代表通胀率。
 
3.近期来访机构很多（FTN,RBC）都提到了medicare对于消费者支出的影响。就个别案例而言，一个美资大型机构的md级别每年因奥黑法案正式实施而至少增加的名义支出是以往的一倍还多。就此事，特Lavorgna咨询，回信如下：
 
thank you for you note. real consumer spending excluding healthcare services is up 2.9% over the past year, slightly less than the overall rate of real spending.  Healthcare is up 4.6% over this time. As ObamaCare takes full effect, healthcare spending is likley to remain growing in the 4% to 5% range. however, spending elsewhere is likely to slow, namely in big-ticket durable items such as autos. hence, overall consumption is probably going to tredn down over time--this is my forecast. regarding inflation, a continuation of decent
healthcare spending (part of which is medicare spending) should help push the core pce higher since healthcare has the largest weight (20%) in the index.
谢谢来信。除医疗服务支出之外的实际消费者支出在去年增长2.9%（截至11月），较整体支出增长略低（3.4%）。医疗支出增长4.6%。在奥黑医疗法案全面实施后，医疗支出可能还会维持4-5%增幅。但是，其他方面的支出似乎在下降，尤其是大宗耐用消费品，像汽车之类。那么，整体消费可能就会趋降——这是我的预测。至于通胀嘛，健康方面（部分是医疗支出）占据了核心pce的20%权重，其持续可观增长有助于推高读数。
 
 
 
沉重的医疗负担会弱化pce与inflation之间的关系吗？
4.LaVorgna: Retail sales have not benefited much from low energy prices ——今晚数据前瞻，很多预测口气很硬，要么几战成名，要么框框打脸
{http://pull.db-gmresearch.com/p/2078-194B/81575332/DB_USEconDly_2016-01-14_0900b8c08aa8c3a9.pdf}
 
December retail sales data are the main event, although other reports such as the preliminary reading on consumer sentiment are important, too. Will the recent sharp decline in stock prices weigh on consumer sentiment? There is a good chance it will. Data on business inventories will also be very important, much more so than in the recent past, because we estimate there was a large drag on GDP last quarter from a significantly slower pace of inventory accumulation. We will also be paying close attention to the producer price index (PPI), in particular the deflation likely to be seen in the earlier stages of processing. Remember, too, that PPI healthcare prices are a key input into the core PCE deflator, the inflation metric Fed policymakers are watching most closely.
12月零售数据是关键，尽管其他的像消费者敏感度的预测值等报告也很重要。近期股市暴跌对消费者心理造成阴影了吗？很可能会的。商业库存数据也很重要，而且本期较近期以来重要得多，因为我们预测库存因显著地缩减增幅将会严重拖累上个季度的GDP。我们还将关注PPI，尤其是加工业早期衰退迹象已经显现。还要记住啊，PPI中的健康医疗价格可是核心PCE通缩指数的重要因变量，而通胀矩阵可是fed老爷们最最关注的啊。
Regarding retail sales, the decline in unit motor vehicle sales (17.22 million in December vs. 18.06 million in November) should keep the headline figure unchanged. Excluding automobiles, sales will be up only modestly, because falling energy costs weigh on the total dollar amount of gasoline sales. Retail control, which excludes autos, gasoline and building materials, should fair slightly better, but it will still be consistent with only a modest gain in overall consumer spending for the quarter.
零售数据嘛，考虑到机构车销售下滑（12月17.22mi vs 11月的18.06mi）可能会使得读数不变。除机动车销售之外，因油价暴跌导致汽油消费金额受压，零售应温和上扬。除去机动车、汽油和建材的核心零售则会相当得不错，但也就是保证上个季度整体消费温和上涨。
Assuming there are no revisions, our forecast of retail control is consistent with a 3.4% annualized increase in Q4 2015. This compares to a 4.6% gain in Q3. More importantly, total inflation-adjusted consumer spending is set to rise just 2.2% at an annualized rate, which would be down from 3.0% in Q3. The year-over-year rate would then be 2.6%, which is exactly the same pace as Q2 2014, when oil prices were near their peak. Hence, the energy tax cut was not really spent; rather it was saved—the household savings rate was 5.5% in November, up from 4.8% in Q2 2014. See "Oil prices and consumer spending: A crude relationship", US Economics Weekly, November 20, 2015, for a more complete discussion. With the stock market down significantly year-to-date, we are concerned that consumer spending could weaken further in the quarters ahead.
假设没有修正的话，我们预测核心消费2015q4持续以3.4%年化增长。q3则为4.6%。更加重要的是，通胀调整后的消费者支出可能增长2.2%，而q3为3.0%。全年年化为2.6%，等同于q2.，而那会儿石油还处在高位呢。那就意味着，能源税减免没有花出去，而是储蓄起来了——家庭储蓄已经从2014q2的4.8%升至11月的5.5%。更详细评论参见“石油价格与消费者支出：原始模型”，美国经济周评，11.20.2015。今年以来股市暴跌，我们就更加担心消费者支出会进一步走弱。
We take little solace in recent robust jobs readings, because employment is not a leading economic indicator. Job gains were strong shortly before the start of each of the last three recessions. For example, in February 1990, the initially-reported reading on nonfarm payroll growth was 372k. Five months later, the economy slipped into recession. In January 2001, nonfarm payrolls rose by a lesser, but still robust, 268k. Just two months later, the economy went into a downturn. Lastly, in October 2007, two months before the onset of the "Great Recession", nonfarm payrolls increased 166k. While this might not seem like much, it was still the second-strongest reading in 2007.
我们不太重视近期强劲的就业读数，因为就业不算是领先经济指标。在最近三次衰退之前，就业指标都曾经短时间强劲过。例如，1990年2月，最初报告的nfp为372k。仅仅5个月后，经济就滑入了衰退。2001年1月，nfp虽然只多了一点，但仍然是强劲的268k，而2月后经济就再次衰退了。最近在2007年10月，仅仅是危机前两月，nfp增加了166k。可能这个数字看起来不太多，但那可是2007的第二大了。
 
5.JACK DI-LIZIA : ECB minutes out -  http://www.ecb.europa.eu/press/accounts/2016/html/mg160114.en.html  昨晚ecb的解读（欧洲的文官以咬文嚼字著称）——引号内都是minutes原文
JACK DI-LIZIA为DB的策略师
ABHISHEK SINGHANIA为DB伦敦的ir交易员FRANCIS YARED为DB伦敦md
ABHISHEK SINGHANIA : "In the euro area, the EONIA（欧洲央行指定日期掉漆利率） forward curve had fully priced in a 10 basis point cut in the deposit facility rate at the current Governing Council meeting and an additional cut of 10 basis points (to -0.40%) by September 2016. " WOuld disagree with the assessment made here“在欧洲地区，eonia的远期曲线已经充分定价了本次GC本次10bp的存款利率调降和2016年9月份会议再调降10bp（-0.40%）”不同意这个评论。（我也不同意，现在已经是-0.30%）ABHISHEK SINGHANIA : the market was pricing in close to 20bp for the December meeting itself
市场为12月会议的定价为减约20bpJACK DI-LIZIA : Council quite balanced on the case for additional depo - "some members vs. some members"
GC就是否额外减息相对平衡-“有些委员vs 有些委员”"Going beyond the proposed 10 basis point cut would, in the view of some members, raise issues about increasing side effects over time. In this context, the experience of other central banks in smaller jurisdictions would only partially apply....
“在有些委员看来，超过10bp的降息会随时间流转带来副作用。这种情况下，其他较小主权范围内的央妈们只会部分应用....At the same time, some members expressed a preference for a 20 basis point cut in the deposit facility rate at the current meeting, mainly with a view to strengthening the easing impact of this measure and reflecting the view that, to date, no material negative side effects on bank margins and financial stability had emerged."
同时，此次会议上有些委员明显倾向于20bp的降息，主要目的在于强化宽松效果，并反映出对当前宽松措施尚未对银行利润和金融稳定性产生实质性副作用的认识。”ABHISHEK SINGHANIA : Clear preference for extending the QE if inflation is not seen to be getting to 2%
如果通胀达不到2%，明显倾向于延长QE"Such an extension of the horizon of the APP would be firmly in line with the Governing Council’s forward guidance, as previous communication had made this horizon conditional on the achievement of a sustained adjustment in inflation consistent with its inflation aim, which, on the basis of the available evidence, was not in sight by the intended end date of September 2016. When extending the programme, it was viewed as important to retain both the calendar-based and contingency-based elements of forward guidance, which included not only extending the intended end date to March 2017 but also reaffirming that the Governing Council would continue to add monetary accommodation via continued purchases for as long as needed to achieve a sustained adjustment in inflation."
FRANCIS YARED : the hawks would have preferred more depo cut than increasing the time frame of QE (let alone the pace I suppose) -- "In sum, most members supported the set of policy measures proposed by Mr Praet, while some members did not, on balance, see a sufficient case for further policy action or were only prepared to support some of the elements put forward. Among the latter, a few members expressed a preference, if further accommodation was seen as warranted, for limiting policy action at the current meeting to a cut in the deposit facility rate, possibly going beyond the 10 basis point reduction that had been proposed and possibly also including the prolongation of fixed rate full allotment tender procedures."鹰派倾向于更多减息而不是延长QE时间（猜测是单独减息）FRANCIS YARED : more depo cut as first next step also implied by the following "A cut in the deposit facility rate of 10 basis points was seen as unlikely to trigger material negative side effects and was also seen as having the advantage of leaving some room for further downward adjustments, should the need arise."
 
6.bc关于ecb minutes的评述——委婉语真多，隐含的对美国经济的判断非常强劲
 
·         We expect the ECB to ease policy further in 2016 as deflationary pressures worsen. However, we think new measures are unlikely to be deployed before June, unless we see another bout of (REER) euro appreciation or a further significant drop in inflation expectations.
 
我们预计ecb在2016年随着通缩压力进一步恶化，将会持续加大宽松政策力度。但是，我们认为新的措施不太可能在6月份之前实施，除非我们看到了再一波欧元升值（REER，实际有效汇率，实际上单纯讨论eur/usd如何如何纯粹nonsense，应该是dm/em）或通胀预期显著调降。
·         Monetary and Financial conditions have deteriorated again after the ECB failed to convince the market that measures announced at the December meeting would be sufficient to bring inflation back closer to its target. The deterioration is worsening at the start of 2016 as a result of stock markets jitters and the further depreciation of the CNY
货币和金融条件在ecb没能让市场相信12月会议宣布的措施足以实现通胀目标之后再次恶化。2016开年以来，因为股市暴跌和cny贬值（早tmd该贬了，从这句话就可以看出之前老外认为你cny死扛着就是雷锋啊），更加严重了。
·         We now expect inflation to return to negative territory between February and July 2016, picking up thereafter as a result of base effects, but averaging only 0.1% for the year as a whole (vs. 1% in the ECB’s December projections). This will put pressure on the ECB to announce another round of monetary easing measures.
现在我们预计2016的2-6月之间通胀回到负领域，然后因基数效应而有所抬头，但全年也就0.1%（vsecb 12月预测值为1%），这将推动ecb采取新一轮货币宽松政策。
 
·         As part of the semi-annual review of the Asset Purchase Programme, which will likely take place in March, the Governing Council (GC) may decide to expand the pool of eligible assets and include more corporate bonds, in order to offset the risk that it encounters volume constraints on the purchase of covered, ABS and Supranational bonds. 
作为可能于3月份开始实施的资产购买计划的半年评论的一部分，GC可能扩大合格资产池，加入更多的公司债，以对冲购买担保债，abs和超主权债遭受的流动性风险（实际上他一个monster把这几个类别买完了，最新热点是可能认定德国这样比较好国家的地方政府债为合格购买品）
·         Another depo rate cut is a possibility. However, we think that there is a risk of a negative impact on banks, which the ECB has to factor in. We think the ECB will likely wait several months to see the impact of its last cut, and we do not envisage such an option before June.
再次调降存款利息是可能的。但是我们认为那样做对银行业会有负面影响，ecb将不得不考虑的。所以我们认为ecb会登上几个月看看这次减息的效果，6月之前应该不会再减息了。
·         The same applies to QE: after the measures announced in December, the ECB is likely to wait before adjusting the size or the timeframe of its asset purchase programme. Given the market constraints that we review in this report, we think an increase in the monthly pace of asset purchases is less likely and would require further deterioration in the inflation outlook. Furthermore, the accounts of the ECB’s December meeting suggest that another 10bp depo rate cut may face less resistance at the GC than QE extension.
就qe而言道理一样的，12月宣布相关措施后，ecb会在调整资产购买计划规模和时间框之前等等看。考虑到此次报告中我们提到的市场容量问题，我们认为增加每月购买量不太可能，除非通胀预期进一步恶化。此外，ecb12月会议的考虑是再减10bp会较延长qe的阻力小一些。
 
·         The ECB is approaching the limits of what it can realistically deliver in order to comply with its mandate to ensure price stability. Whether it decides to make another depo rate cut, give more explicit forward guidance, or extend QE, the impact on inflation, in our view, is unlikely to be sizeable. Fiscal and structural policies at the euro area and country level will need to be put in place, as President Draghi has repeatedly said at each press conference.
Ecb已经差不多达到维持物价职能的上限了。不管他是否再次减息，更加清晰的通胀前瞻，或者延长qe，我们看来对通胀的影响都不太可能可观。欧盟及各国国家层面的财政和结构性政策需要协调，正如draghi在每次新闻发布会上强调的。（德国总是唱反调？）
7.Dominic AM Surprise Note.. So what next? US rates Strat
 
The rates higher than lower outlook for this year is clearly being derailed, we think by the resumption of China risk being center stage. The China issue has never gone away but the year end optimism around China has been misplaced -- and it all comes done to understanding that China is not about FX but the unwind of the credit bubble and the role of the RMB carry trade.
考虑到中国风险集聚的情况下，我们认为年内逐步加息的进程完全脱轨了。中国主题从未谢幕，但是去年末关于中国的乐观情绪显然错位了——一旦明白中国的问题不只是fx，还有信贷泡沫戳破和cny乘息交易的清盘。
The idea that 1. China was less important to US growth and the Fed or 2. that sdr inclusion would bring capital inflows or 3 that a current acct surplus means depreciation was undesirable/unnecessary have all been misplaced. Until the carry trade is unwound meaning a further decent loss of reserves -- a few hundred billion -- and / or the currency is allowed to float. Then we are as far away as ever as dealing with credit losses in financial sector. And that means we remain in a broad dollar up cycle that is always bad for risk assets and good for lower rates. Also would add to this idea that China has made it clear in targeting a basket that any further stimulus from boj/ecb to devalue vs. USD wont be allowed to also mean devalue vs. RMB, so in itself means less stimulative for europe/japan.
下面这些认识都错了：1、中国没有美国增长和fed重要；2、加入sdr将带来资本流入；3、经常账户盈余意味着贬值没有必要。在乘息交易清盘导致外储进一步下降之前——几千亿吧（美刀）——或许cny会被允许自由浮动。那时我们才可能离处置金融部门信贷坏账离得远远的。这就是说我们还处在更大的一个美元升值周期内，这个周期对风险资产总是不利的，对于更低利率则是有利的。（弃股长债？关键看中国能不能稳住了）同时因为cny已经是针对一篮子货币了，boj或ecb任何针对美元贬值的举措都不在意味着对cny贬值，对冲了boj/ecb相关措施效果。
There are therefore several avenues that China reinforces the risk off trade. 1 the loss of reserves itself means that even if intervention sterilized the dollar, liquidity implications are net risk off. Adding back in overnight RMB liquidity is not so risk friendly and the original RMB liquidity counterpart to reserve accumulation. 2. The dollar cycle itself of which this is a part is always negative commodities and not good for global equities, even if SPX might outperform as well as 3. The broadening of china issues to now limit further stimulus from ecb/boj without involving further RMB downside.
那么中国因素加剧去风险交易就带来几个效果：1、自身外储流失意味着即使通过干预稳定了对美元汇价，流动性缺失也会加剧去风险交易。实际上隔夜cny流动性可不那么风险友好，最初的那些cny借出大户都在蓄水了。2、这是美元自身周期的一部分，对大宗负面，对全球股市负面，即便spx表现优异也如是。3、中国因素扩展开去，不考虑cny进一步向下情况下，也限制了ecb/boj的政策效果。（贬值真的晚了）
All of this is the thick layer of liquidity/policy response that lies over the core issue of a credit bubble that requires writedowns. So what next? Either more of the same --maybe eventual cnh float Or Fed needs to shift gear -- but not to say they are not hiking but say one more hike then say are done until further notice. We had thought they might get to 75 or 100 bps then be done. Would suggest 50 and done. Might be a better way to go. Whats nice about that is that that means couldsell march/april and buy sep or dec..for good risk reward..Issue for whether Fed can resume ultimately depends on whether nominal growth recovers through inflation and productivity -- former unlikely, latter some chance but really depends on consumer not driving savings rate.
所有这些都是基于需要核销的信贷泡沫的流动性和政策层面的反应。下一步会发生什么呢？或者更多类似政策——可能cnh完全浮动或者fed换挡——那并不是说不加息了而是加一次或两次后等等看效果。我们曾经认为fed可能会加息75/100bp后停下。现在则可能是50bps后收手了。可能这条路还好。那样的话，3/4月份卖，9/10买，会有很不错的风险收益啊。Fed会不会这么想最终取决于名义GDP增长是否会覆盖通胀和工业产出——前者不太可能，后者有些机会但有赖于消费者不急着储蓄。
实际上当下riskoff的最大诱因来自于油价跌破30，同时因为下周一美国假日，市场担心长周末效应。

央妈为了摆脱美元阴影，新搞了一个一篮子货币。尽管这个机制设计得很完美，也可能通过限制zhongzi机构拆出人民币的方式对抗美元升值，但是这个篮子中的其他货币还是对美元贬值的，所以最终还是会受到贬值压力，虽然不是直接的。
最新基调：美股超调，市场预期中国不会硬着陆，市场错误的认为低油价有害经济~~~~似乎可以空黄金了

1.us session color
 
有点世界末日的赶脚~~
 
_bc
US 
So the more confident tone that was set in Tokyo yesterday didn't last long! US equities plummeted, oil dropped in a failed attempt to break through $30 again, and treasuries staged a monster 10bps intra-day rally that saw 10yr yield 2.04% and 30yr touch 2.82%, before a snap reversal left the market a mere 3bps higher on the day. 
昨日东京交易时段建立起的那点儿信心并没有持续太久。Us股市暴跌，原油再次跌穿30魏国，t日内暴涨怪兽级10bp，10yr收益率降至2.04%，30yr甚至触及2.82%，临收盘快速反转涨幅缩减为3bp
Even the massive Inbev deal (reports as high as $110bn) could not push treasuries lower and rather the weakness in stocks and global promise for 2016 made any selling from the deal a wanted commodity. The UST Dept. also issued 10yr notes which only saw buying causing the auction to come through 1.3bps from its WI level at 1pm. Again, high indirect participation (71%) points to decent central bank particpation. We did have some very big orders ourselves so know where some of that paper has gone. THere has been scepulation that oil money may be purchasing the auctions this week too, but that we can neither confirm nor deny. What we can confirm is that even at these yields, demand for quality paper is strong. 
天量InBev发行也没能推低t，股市疲弱和全球2016前景黯淡使得任何T的抛售都成为了一种必需品。美国财政部也新发了10yr，下午1点时候只叫低了1.3bp就卖完了。再一次间接买盘（71%）占优，表明央妈们的参与。我们自己的确有些大单子，所以我们知道买家是谁。市场传言石油美元本周也在买，但我们即不确认也不否认（贱不贱？：）)我们能确认的是，就这收益率水平，买盘杠杠的！（真tmd贱！）
Last nights data was again irrelevent. However, the Beige Book may offer some signs to future Fed policy. While noting continued moderate/modest expansion, the Fed regions also mentioned that wage pressures were subdued. Unless we get wage inflation, it will be hard for the Fed to convince the market that there are real inflationary considerations. This will mean they will have to slow down the current desired course, and could equate to less hiking this year than Economists want to believe. The short-end of the UST market noticed this, and 2yr notes rallied hard. 
昨夜数据再次无关紧要。但是，黄皮书还是暗示了一些fed未来政策走向。黄皮书点明美国经济持续温和或适度扩张，也提到工资上涨压力仍存。除非触发工资性通胀，否则fed很难说服市场他们是在真的担心通胀。那就意味着他们会降低加息不发，缓于经济学家预测的那样。短端市场也是这么想的，2yr涨得可猛了
As for today, well it is hard to see a good day for Asian equities next up. US stocks are now down -7%, European stocks about the same, and Asia a touch worse. Nobody is willing to commit to buying equities here either, sighting further retracements. That leaves a hole that needs to be filled, and while that is getting plugged, treasuries will probably likely to keep their bullish tone. If $100bn in bonds can't push yields higher, we're running out of ideas to what might!
今天嘛，很难看到亚洲股市能够涨起来。毕竟美股跌了7%（开年以来），欧股也差不多，亚洲还要更糟一些。没人愿意进场，那么就还会再跌。这就留下一个缺口待回补，而股市跌，t则会维持牛市。如果100bn债券（本周公司债发行量）都不能推高收益率，我们想象不出会发生什么了
Canada   Despite the positive risk tone in Asia, bonds opened better bid in Toronto with Canada outperforming the US by 3bps. In Asia we saw good two-way flow: selling of 10yrs to buy 5yrs, along with buying in FRNs. Our Asian clients are generally trying to reduce duration and take a stab at being short, either by retracting or selling the front-end ahead of next week’s rate meeting. This is the opposite view of domestics, who continue to pile into the market with 2yrs and 5yrs particularly favoured. The tone in 5yrs was helped by the successful auction of C$3.5bn CAN 0.75 3/21, which will become the new 5yr benchmark tomorrow. The one exception to the well-bid Canadian market is 30yrs, which continued to underperform yesterday after a momentum seller pushed the 10s30s curve 3bps steeper. As the curve steepened we did see some interest to buy 30yrs both outright and against the US. 80bps on 10s30s is approaching the steeps of the past 25yrs,  and we like flatteners at these levels. We’ve fielded many questions on the possibility of a rate cut next week, 44% priced into OIS markets. We expect the Bank to maintain the overnight rate target at 0.50%, but support the notion that a rate cut will be delivered if data disappointments continue or financial and commodity markets fail to recover. In this case, the market appears expensive but the risk-reward of selling (2s and 5s mostly) is not attractive. Particularly if you’re bearish oil, the front-end is a relatively safe play and there are still certain issues that are relatively cheap on the curve (Mar18s, Jun18s).  Today we are flexible but can buy some 5yrs. 
Provincials 
After a decent opening in equities we got a new issue done for BC, 500mm longs.  It was sold out but not oversold, and dealers hit spreads on screens post-deal.  Our flows were again light, almost non-existent in fact.  One not-so-positive sign in the steepening of our 5s-10s credit curve in unison with the steepening Canada 5s-10s curve -- that's another bearish development. 5s outperformed 10s by 1.5bps today. On the bull side, we sold a block of long NBRNS today -- any traction in the peripheral names is a positive development -- and ONT raised C$3.5BN via their USD3yr deal today.  Spreads end 0.5-2bps wider on the day.
CanhouWe're another 0.5-1bp wider yesterday which puts us right at the absolute wides on CMB spreads. We can take a sale of 5yr CMBs... either Jun20, Jun21, and Dec22. ASW buyers remain non-existent. We are also buyers of Dec18s.
 
——db
Treasuries finished a few bps firmer on Wednesday, with the curve fractionally steeper as the late day pricing of InBev's $46bn deal somewhat offset the risk-off slump in stocks.  Volumes were 133% of recent averages.
周三t收涨几个bps，晚些时候InBev46bn的消息出来后曲线部分走陡，对冲了部分股市暴跌导致的去风险氛围。交易量为近期均值133%。
 
Treasuries initially opened cheaper in early NY as a stable CNY fixed and buoyant stocks induced wave of profit-take selling in Tokyo.  Inbev's announcement of their multi tranche deal (later confirmed at $46bn including $11bn 10s, $6bn 20s and $11bn 30s, compared to yesterday's expectations of closer to $25bn) kept pressure on treasuries and drove the curve to give-up earlier flattening.  
Ny早盘t跌了一点点，cny定盘价再次企稳，推动股市上涨，并触发ny时间内的止盈盘。InBev的多期限的发债设计（后来确认为11bn的10s，6bn的20s和11bn的30s，昨天传言为25bn）导致t受压，回吐一度的走平幅度。
 
Treasuries started to squeeze higher mid-NY morning as oil slumped to almost $30 again as DOE announced another increase in gas inventories.  The 10yr reopening was very well received, stopping 1bp through at 2.09%.  Dealers were left holding a very small 17.7%, compared to a recent average of ~27%.  Treasuries leapt higher on the following, seemingly triggering a wave of stops of aucton shorts as stocks continued to slump.  We witnessed fast money short covering in 10s after the auction.  Fixed income ran into a wall of selling shortly before the close as the late day pricing of the Inbev deal started to flow through the market - approximately pricing time was 4:30pm.  
Ny中午时段，doe宣布汽油库存暴涨之后，油价再次跌倒30，t就开始涨了。10yr拍卖买盘强劲，就跌了1bp定在2.09%。交易商手里只有17.7%，而近期是27%。其他期限交替上涨，在股市暴跌背景下，似乎触发空头止损。晚些时候InBev消息出来，t上涨遇阻，然后回落——大概定价以4:30pm为准。

2.US Beige Book Report, still no upward pressures on wages——natixis
 29号正式公布GDP，难道不会有惊喜了吗？毕竟有机构预测0.5%
Key points: today’s Beige Book confirmed that the US economy continued to grow at a modest pace in late Q4 2015. Comments were positive on consumer spending though auto sales cooled down in some Districts. Labor market has seen more employment growth but wage pressures remained subdued. Activity in the manufacturing sector remained weak in some Districts and was still mixed at the national level. Activity in the services and construction sectors experienced a broad-based strengthening. Short-term outlook was generally optimistic. 
摘要：今日黄皮书确认美国经济在2015q4维持温和增长。消费者支出评论正面，尽管机构车销售在某些地区遇冷。劳动力市场进一步好转，但工资压力依存。制造业活动在某些地区依然疲弱，全国范围内也是喜忧参半。服务业和建筑业广泛增强。短期展望总体上乐观。
3.bc 2016展望摘要
The risks to global growth have increased on the back of recent developments in 
China, commodity markets and the related financial pressures. CNY depreciation 
and commodity price declines are weighing further on EM assets, including 
currencies. The ongoing slump in oil prices impacts energy-related financial 
assets globally. Potential implications for financial stability could offset 
the net positive effects lower oil prices otherwise have on global growth (by 
shifting rents to oil consumers). Thus far, the consumer-driven growth in 
advanced economies seems resilient, particularly as labour market conditions 
remain solid. Thus, the main risks from China and commodity markets seem to be on inflation dynamics rather than on growth, as global deflationary forces 
trump nascent domestic inflation drivers. However, this continues to complicate 
the tasks of core central banks as they weigh still decent growth and labour 
market performance against the perils of persistent below-target inflation.
 
近期中国、商品市场乃至相关金融压力的发展导致全球增长风险加剧。Cny贬值和商品价格下跌对em资产和货币的压力进一步加大。油价持续下跌导致能源相关资产全球范围内受压。似乎预示着其带来的金融稳定性的丧失会对冲低油价对全球经济增长（降低原油消费者支出）的好处。截至当前，发达国家的消费者驱动型增长依然保持有弹性，尤其是劳动力市场不断改善。那么，来自中国和商品市场的主要风险在于通胀动力而不是增长压力，当下全球性通缩压力完全盖住了国内的通胀驱动因素。但是，这就使得央妈们的任务更加复杂了，尤其是在他们看重一定规模经济增长和劳动力市场改善，全然不顾长期低于目标值的通胀危险的时候。
 
4.Houston, we've got a problem (David Geisker)
 
brief
Conclusion
 
The headline rings even truer now with the oil industry in disarray. The equity volumes on the decline were again relatively light, so it does not seem to be capitulation but lack of fresh demand and valuation fears. Those 4 Fed hikes in 2016 are looking increasing hard to see from here and Fed funds for end 2016 just over 70 bps, which is some 25 bps below its 30 Dec lows. The Fed will have to write a new playbook for 2016 and change their tune and the question is who will make the signal.  Equity volatility continues in 2016 and we already have seen 2 days of 2 pct plus moved in 8 trading days compared with around 11 days for all of 2015.
 原油工业乱作一团，我们这个标题就更加真实了（休斯顿，我们遇到麻烦了！）股市下降但是交易量很小，看起来就不太像多头放弃抵抗了，可又没啥新买盘，估值顾虑重重。2016估计的4次加息看起来不太可能了，ff年底期货预计才70bp，也就比12月高25bp左右。Fed需要重新造计划了，改变一下强调，问题是谁发出了这个信号呢。2016股市继续大幅波动，8个交易日中已经有两个日内波幅超2%，而2015全年才有11个左右。
Some are noting even during the housing crisis as depicted in the “BIG SHORT” it was often very hard to hold the position during that period and it took a long time to unfold. Investors are feeling the same way about CNH, it is not an easy path.
 
The scoreboard reads S&P down 7.5 pct YTD and NASDAQ down 9.6 pct YTD after 8 trading days. Might need that Powerball ticket tomorrow. The Russell is in a bear market and it will surely be a matter of time before the S&P goes there as well, ending this cycle as the 3rd longest bull market in history.
今年才8个交易日spx跌7.5%，nasdaq跌9.6% 。需要明天买彩票了。罗素美国股票指数已经跌入熊市了，spx也是迟早的事儿，史上第3长牛市终将会结束。
 
 
5.J LaVorgna -> What are tax receipts telling us?
 
 
 
{http://pull.db-gmresearch.com/p/2076-01B8/83075534/DB_USEconDly_2016-01-13_0900b8c08aa7c262.pdf}
 
The latest economic data have been mixed and point to a dual-track economy, whereby consumer spending appears relatively healthy, while the manufacturing sector is facing significant headwinds from declining exports, a strong dollar and an inventory overhang. When the economic data send conflicting signals with respect to the near-term growth outlook, it is useful to focus on high-frequency data series that either do not get revised or only get revised slightly. Withheld income tax receipts and initial jobless claims are two of our favorite indicators as the former are never revised and revisions to the latter are usually very small. While jobless claims continue to point to steady hiring, withheld income tax receipts have modestly decelerated. 
最近的经济数据喜忧参半，冰火两重天，一半是消费者支出看起来健康增长，一半是制造业因出口下滑，美元升值和存货高居不下而困扰重重。当近期数据相互矛盾的时候，聚焦那些高频且不修正或只轻微修正的数据总是游泳的。收入预扣税和初请就是这样的，前者从未被修正，后者虽然修正但总是很小。初请持续表明雇佣稳定增长，而预扣税却稍微在减速。
Withheld income tax receipts are highly volatile on a daily basis. Hence, we smooth the daily data in order to distill the monthly and quarterly trends. As the chart below indicates, withheld income tax receipts are growing at a still-healthy 4.4% annual rate, but this is down from a 5%-plus pace that had been the trend since roughly Q2 2014. This is noteworthy because as the pace of job growth slows—in year-over-year terms nonfarm payroll growth peaked at 2.3% in February 2015 and has since decreased to 1.9%—income growth will need to be sustained by an increase in either wage growth or hours worked. Fortunately, as we noted in our commentary earlier this week, there are nascent signs that wage growth may firm in the quarters ahead. 
按日看预扣税高度波动。那么我们将每日数据平滑来找出按月和按季的趋势来。如下图所示，预扣税尚在年化4.4%速度增长，但是较2014q2以来的5+%有所下降。这点尤其重要，是因为岗位增幅——nfp年化增幅从2015的2月份峰值2.3%之后降到现在的1.9%——收入增长要么靠工资增长维持要么靠劳动时间延长维持。幸运的是，正如早些时候我们写周评的时候，国内还是有种种迹象表明工资增长将在未来几个季度里持续。
To be sure, as the labor market approaches full employment, nonfarm payroll gains should slow since excess labor market slack has mostly been absorbed. Dallas Fed President Kaplan (non-voter) recently suggested that payroll growth of 150k-plus per month would be sufficient to put downward pressure on the unemployment rate. We agree. 
需要肯定的是，在劳动力市场接近充分就业的时候，nfp读数将因劳动力市场潜力被吸收而减缓。达拉斯联储主席（非投票人）近期表示150k的读数足够压低失业率的了。我们认同。
In this regard, the recent trend in initial jobless claims has been encouraging. We get new data for the week of January 9 this morning, but as of the latest release for the week ending January 2, the four-week trailing average of claims stood at 276k, modestly above the post-recession low of 263k, reached last October. Given the volatility of jobless claims, especially around holiday periods, we expect temporary spikes from time to time. However, as long as the four-week average remains comfortably below 300k, we can be fairly confident that job growth remains decent. That said, we are not looking for much further improvement in jobless claims—they are hovering near roughly four-decade lows. Rather, we are vigilant for any sustained uptrend that would indicate a more pronounced deterioration in hiring.
在这种考虑下，近期初请数字也是令人鼓舞的。我们将于明早拿到1月9号这种数据，但是以1月2日结束那一周计，四周移动平均值为276k，比危机后去年10月份达到的低点263k略微高一点。考虑到初请的波动率，尤其是在重大节日前后，我们预期总是会是不是出现峰值。但是，只要4周移动平均低于300k，我们就可以相当有信心说就业增长幅度可观。那就是说，我们现在并不在乎初请还能改善多少——那已经是40年来的低点了。更多的是，我们在加倍小心那种有可能表明雇佣在显著恶化且持续的向上趋势。（似乎对坏消息更加敏感了）

1.us session color
 
_bc
There were many questions on the 8bp rally, which usually is indicative of positioning and indeed it feels like the market is short. The move was driven by the risk-off sentiment and the fall in oil prices. However the short covering, which we think came from both dealers and real money, did contribute to the size of the move. Today’s risk off move was reminiscent of the day in August when oil/stocks had an exaggerated sell-off and Treasuries had as well an abrupt bull flattening. That cleaned up a lot of the positioning in the market, and similarly today’s stop-outs should have done so as well. The 3y auction went through .9bps, and we think the demand was also exacerbated by market positioning.
涨8bp有好多问题，这通常意味着加仓，但实际上感觉市场空头占优。风险厌恶情绪和油价暴跌主导市场。但是，我们觉得交易商和真钱的空头回补肯定夹杂其中。今天的去风险走势就是8月份油股夸张式暴跌，t也迅速牛平那一幕的重演。市场上的很多仓位已经被清场，今天止损盘也会被打掉。3yr拍卖只有0.9bps波幅，我们觉得这种需求也为市场仓位所确认。
There was overall buying of the belly and long end, and real money two-way in the front end, though again net better selling. The curve flattening was a majority a bounce off the steepness yesterday, as we think it was just overdone yesterday.  Both 2s and TU are rich and we’ve seen buyers of off the 2s come in at these levels. Off the run bonds are also in fashion as they caught a bid as well. US, after cheapening last week from rich levels, has once again outperformed (both in yesterday’s steepening and today’s flattening).
中长段总体是买盘，前段真钱买卖互线，尽管再次是净卖盘多一些。曲线走平大概率是昨天走陡的反弹，我们也觉得昨天市场有点过度反应。2s和TU都涨不少，我们看到卖掉2s的那些客户又开始买回。非热门券也比较抢手了，当这些客户回来出价了。在上周高位回调之后，us再次表现优异（不管是昨天的走陡和今天的走平）
_db
 
Treasuries raced higher on Tuesday in bull flattening mode to close firmer by up to 8bps as oil slumped and the expected size of the InBev deal was shaved back to $20-$25bn.  Volumes were 161% of recent averages.
T在周二上涨，走平收涨约8bps，原油暴跌，预计InBev新发规模在20-25bn之间。交易量为近期均值161%。
Fixed income initially came under pressure into early NY trading as bunds struggled to absorb a wave of European Government supply (UST/bunds closed 6bps tighter) and expectations grew that InBev was set to announce their issuance at the outset of NY trading.  With no announcement from InBev and a general scaling back of the deals expected size from $50-60bn to $20-25bn, treasuries were quick to bounce in early NY trading.  Combined with oil briefly dipping below $30, bloomberg commodities index falling to lowest since 1991, and IG indices pushing past the December wides.  Bond contracts led the move higher with more talk of CTAs selling oil to buy USH6.  
Ny早些时候固收受压，德国国债在早盘一波欧洲政府债新供给及InBev有望宣布在ny时段开盘前发布最新发行量之后才有所起色。因为一直迟迟没有公布，且传言发行规模有望从原来的50-60bn降到20-25bn，t在ny早盘迅速反弹。同时，油价短时间跌至30以下，彭博商品指数跌至1991年以来新低，投资级指数涨过12月高位。债券买卖主导走高，市场传言有HF在空油买ush6。
 
Despite the size of the rally, our overall flows were surprisingly mixed with fast money buying in 10s and 30s off-set by international real money selling in intermediates.  The afternoon 3yr auction was relatively strong, stopping 0.9bps through at 1.174%.  A strong indirect bid meant dealers were left holding just 28%, compared to a recent average of 40.2%.  
不考虑涨幅，我们的客盘整体看令人吃惊的买卖互线，快钱买10s和30s，而国际真钱则通过中介进行了对冲。下午的3yr拍卖相对较强，涨0.9bps到1.174%。间接买盘较强，交易商手里只留了28%左右，而近期均值为40.2%。
We remain with 5/30s flatteners.  As discussed yesterday, we'd like to add to this position into this week's 10&30s supply, and InBev deal.
 
我们维持5/30s走平仓位。正如昨天讨论的那样，因本周10/30s供给以及InBev的新发行，还会增加这种仓位。（实际上已经套很久了，这算摊低成本吗？）
 
2.J LaVorgna -> More signs of mounting wage pressures? _highly important!
 
{http://pull.db-gmresearch.com/p/2077-1A76/70038416/DB_USEconDly_2016-01-12_0900b8c08aa6854f.pdf}
 
The December National Federation of Independent Business (NFIB) small business optimism index edged slightly higher (95.2 vs. 94.8 previously), but remains below its post-recession peak of 100.4, reached in December 2014. The current reading is also low relative to the average during the last business cycle (100.7). However, within the details of the NFIB report, the net percentage of firms planning to raise worker compensation remained elevated at 20% for the second consecutive month. This is the highest level since November 2006 and well above the average in the last expansion (15%). 
12月NFIB小型商业景气指数微涨（95.2vs94.8），但仍然位于危机后2014年12月创下的高位100.4之下。当前读数相对于前个商业周期的100.7的均值也低。但是，在NFIB的构成部分中，计划增加工人报酬的公司占比还是连续第二月维持了约20%的增幅。这是自2006年11月以来的最高值，远高于上次扩张周期（15%）。
The chart below shows the quarterly average of NFIB compensation plans compared to the year-over-year growth rate of average hourly earnings (AHEs) for production and nonsupervisory workers. The former series leads the latter by four quarters, and there is a decent correlation of 0.75 between the two series. Last quarter, the NFIB compensation figure averaged 19%, the highest since Q1 2001 (20%). While the economy was on the verge of entering a very mild recession at that time, the unemployment rate was 4.2% and the year-over-year growth rate of AHEs was 4.1%. On the surface, the NFIB data point to a sharp acceleration in labor costs. How much faster can wages grow, as average hourly earnings are currently up just 2.4% on a year-over-year basis? 
下图是NFIB的报酬计划按季平均与制造和非监管行业工人AHEs的年华增长率关系图。前者领先后者约4个季度，大约有0.75的线性相关性。上个季度，NFIB的报酬数字平均为19%，为2011Q1以来新高（20%）。那时经济正处在轻微衰退的关口，失业率在4.2￥，AHEs年华增长4.1%。表明上，NFIB数字指出了一个劳动力成本显著加速的现象。（但是）工资能涨多快呢？毕竟每小时工资当前年华只有2.4%涨幅。
A regression of AHEs on NFIB compensation plans tells us that the growth rate of the former could pick up dramatically over the next few quarters. For example, the regression equation predicts year-over-year growth in AHEs of production and nonsupervisory workers of 2.8% this quarter, 2.8% in Q2, 3.0% in Q3 and then 3.5% in Q4 2016. Hence, on the surface, the NFIB points to a sharp acceleration in wage inflation. However, since the same regression is currently over-predicting wage growth by about 80 basis points, wage acceleration is likely to be more modest this year than the NFIB data suggest. Other data indicate firming wage pressures, as well. 
拟合AHEs和NFIB报酬计划告诉我们前者的增长会领先后者几个季度。例如，回归方程预测产业和非监管工人AHEs本季年华增长2.8%，Q2 2.8%，3.0在Q3,3.5在2016的Q4.那么，表面上，NFIB预计会在工资性通胀方面加速增长。但是，因为同样的回归经常性过高估计工资增长约80bp，今年工资增长则会更加温和，相对于NFIB指示的那样。其他数据也表明工资压力也是存在的（劳动参与率etc）
Yesterday, we learned that the quits rate, a series within the JOLTS, remained at 2.0% in November for the second consecutive month, 0.3% below its previous-cycle peak. The hiring rate was steady at 3.6% for the fifth consecutive month, 0.4% below the peak in the last cycle. These JOLTS series, two of Fed Chair Yellen's favorites, point to a more moderate increase in wage inflation, to almost 3.0% by yearend. While the latest NFIB and JOLTS data may be a modest positive for wage inflation, we question whether corporate margins can sustain rising labor costs in an environment of low productivity and weak global demand. Strong job gains last quarter alongside what is expected to be weak GDP growth do not bode well for the former.
 
昨天我们讨论了JOLTS下面的辞职率，11月为连续第二个月维持在2%，低于前次景气周期峰值0.3%。雇佣率连续第五个月稳定在3.6%，低于前次景气周期峰值0.4%。这些JOLTS序列，两个都是耶伦大婶的最爱之一，都指向一个到年底约3.0%的比较中性的工资性通胀。在最新NFIB和JOLTs序列都指向比较温和的工资通胀情况下，我们怀疑公司边际利润在当前低产能和弱全球需求的情况下，是否能够支撑劳动力成本上升。上个季度强劲的就业数据和疲弱的GDP增长（Q4GDP要等到29号）对于薪资增长不是好消息。
3.Why did we rally in UST?_inspiring!
 
1. Weak oil (number 1 reason) -> WTI dipped below $30/bbl for first time since 2003 after EIA cuts demand and increase production forecast. Further UAE oil minister acknowledging that OPEC’s effort to pump competitors out of business will continue.
1、弱油价（最重要的！）在EIA削减需求增加产出预测报告发布之后，WTI跌至30以下创2003以来新低。UAE石油大臣承认opec成员努力排挤竞争者努力将会持续表态之后进一步下跌。
2. Short-covering from lack of corp issuance? Market felt like it was leaning short ahead of advertised expected issuance i.e. expected size of the InBev deal was shaved back to $20-$25bn from $50-60bn
因公司债发行减少而导致的空头回补？市场感觉在已经和预期宣布的公司债新发量上过度做空了，如InBev削减债券发行从50-60bn到20-25bn
 
3. Pretty strong 3yr auction? 3yr auction yield 1.174% lowest since Oct 0.8 bp thru, b/c 2.94 from 3.14 last month. Indirect bidders bought 62.8% highest since Nov 09. Rated 4 by five primary dealers. 
3yr拍卖火爆？3yr拍卖结果为1.174%，较10月涨0.8，买方倍数2.94（上期为3.14），间接买盘62.8%为1109以来最高。5大主要交易商评级为4.
4. CTA and RM buying now? Chatter has it that on the run up in UST there have been decent buying from that community. Also, talks of CTA selling oil to buy USH6 -> USH6 is near its richest levels all time.
Cta和真钱买入？传言是这么说，买盘巨大，也有传cts卖油买ush6——而ush6接近有史以来最高点。
Mr. Kwan called the situation a "crisis of confidence" in the Chinese economy. 
 
4.KKR Holds Most Cash Since 2011 as Risks in Stocks Increases ——RBS昨天有篇文章说要储备现金过冬，其实hf已经布局了~
-Private equity firm correctly predicted global stock rebound
-Recommends clients hold 7 percent of their assets in cash
 
For the first time in five years holding cash could provide better returns than other assets as risks grow for global stocks, according to KKR & Co., the private equity firm that correctly predicted the global stock rebound last quarter.
 
KRR’s Global Macro & Asset Allocation team recommends its clients hold 7 percent of their assets in cash, up from 1 percent in September, according to its 2016 outlook report posted on its website. It also lowered holdings of global equities to 51 percent from 55 percent, marking the first underweight rating since 2011.
 
“Unfortunately, as we look ahead, we do not see 2016 as a less chaotic year,” the KKR team, led by Henry Mcvey, wrote in the report. “We want to create a cash buffer at the start of the year that we can deploy amidst any downdraft in risk assets.”
 
After nearly a decade of low interest rates that penalized savers and buoyed global stocks, volatility in financial markets is increasing as U.S. borrowing costs rise and China’s economic slowdown shows no signs of abating. The Standard & Poor’s 500 Index posted its worst-ever start to a year, sliding 6 percent last week.
 
Profits Peaked
 
Global economic growth may be “well below” investors’ consensus, companies’ operating margin has “essentially peaked” in the U.S., and credit quality will worsen, Mcvey wrote.
 
The yuan could decline between 5 percent and 10 percent this year as the world’s second-biggest economy slows, dragging other emerging-market currencies down, he said. KKR, which oversees $99 billion in assets as of September, expects the South Korean won and Singapore dollar will fall against the U.S. currency.
 
Mcvey, who previously worked as chief investment strategist at Morgan Stanley, raised U.S. equities to overweight on Sept. 8 to take advantage of a selloff sparked by a shock devaluation of the yuan. In fact, the S&P 500 rose about 5 percent by the end of the year.
 
He also told investors in May to stay away from most of the publicly traded emerging-market companies, another timely call.
 
Mcvey said the bear market in developing nations is not over as return-on-equity deteriorates, currencies remain weak and commodity prices won’t improve until later this year. The benchmark MSCI Emerging Market Index has dropped 40 percent since May 2011.
 
Here’s more advice from him: Private lending is becoming more appealing as borrowers seek alternative funding sources after tight financial regulations convinced banks to reduce loans and cut back market-making business. Credit markets are more attractive than equities after the recent selloff and China’s efforts to reduce debt will lead to “new and exciting opportunities” for distressed investors, he added.
 
Still, Mcvey said, there are fewer opportunities than before: “Our message is that we see less upside to many markets than we have in recent years.”
 
(Updates with comments on private-market lending in 10th paragraph.)
--With assistance from Devin Banerjee. 
 
5.Asia 日间评论
 
Treasuries slide lower today in Tokyo led by intermediates and we're currently 2bps cheaper than late NY levels.  Upon the opening bell we ran into a wave of profit-take selling from Asia banks and fast money accounts in 7s and 10s which continued through the morning.  Net selling on the day summed to ~$350mm 10yr equivalents.  
东京时间T由中介主导走低，现在已经比ny时段晚些时候便宜2bps。早上一开市直到中午，亚洲银行和真钱在7s和10s上纷纷获利了结。日内净卖出350mm10yr等价物
 
A stable CNY fixing (4th day in a row of stability) added to the tone with S&P currently +15.5.  Broker volumes were again high at 1.5 times recent averages.  We remain in 5/30s flatteners.  As discussed yesterday, we'd like to add to this position into this week's 10&30s supply, and potential InBev deal. 6.Nowhere to hide for Asia... How Chinese Policymakers wrestle back some _下班收到的，他山之石吧，没时间翻了
Buy the usd dip!
 
Nowhere to hide for Asia 13 January 2016 (2 pages/ 333 kb)
Download the complete report: http://pull.db-gmresearch.com/p/1681-34C3/75599693/DB_FXDaily_2016-01-13_0900b8c08aa78809.pdf
After a destabilizing sell-off in the RMB complex at the start of the year, Chinese policymakers have wrestled back some control of the FX market this week. This has involved a series of action points:
First, they have stabilized the USD/CNY fixing, keeping it essentially flat for four straight days. This has involved fixing stronger than the previous day's spot close and resulted in a small bounce in the trade-weighted basket, after it broke below 100 last week (Chart 1).
Second, authorities have undertaken large suspected intervention mostly in the offshore CNH market (Source: Bloomberg), narrowing back the CNH-CNY basis to flat from as high as 1800 points last week (Chart 2).. To the extent that this basis has become a key leading indicator for global volatility like VIX, this has helped to calm markets
Third, through the process of intervention above, authorities withdrew a significant amount of CNH liquidity, squeezing CNH funding and driving overnight implied yields on USD/CNH to close to 100% earlier this week. By making it prohibitively expensive to go long USD, this helped short circuit speculative positions.
Fourth, PBOC has increased communication with the market via a series of press releases in which they have stressed that they are targeting basket stability, and discouraging perceptions that their objective was to engineer a large move in USD/CNY.
The coordinated policy response and price action suggests we could be returning to a window of relative stability with scope for retracement in risk assets. However -- and we suspect this will be a pattern that might repeated several times -- we expect upside pressure on USD/CNY to return. Indeed, a few medium term rule-of-thumb relationships suggest that 7 remains an achievable target for the year.
First, the anticipated compression in US-China rate differentials. Historically, a 100bp move in the front-end bond spreads has been associated with a 30 big figure move in USD/CNY (Chart 3). DB forecasts currently project 75bp of hikes from the Fed, and 50bps of cuts from PBOC which would put 7 on USD/CNY within reach.
Second, the pace of reserves changes has been closely correlated with FX performance. Based on a simple regression, every $100bn change in reserves has been associated with a 1% move in USD/CNY (Chart 4). Should the pace of capital outflows and reserves drawdown from the last six months continue this year, it would be consistent with USD/CNY trading to 7 by year-end.
Third, our forecasts for continued USD strength in China's trade-partner currencies would be consistent with USD/CNY fixing near 7 by year-end for the basket to remain at 100. A downside bias to the basket below 100 presents an upside risk to USD/CNY spot.
More broadly we worry that the logic of China managing its currency against a basket is fraught with problems. As the second largest economy in the world, RMB the fourth most used currency for global payments, and the largest currency weight in baskets of US, Europe, Japan and most Asian economies (BIS), the rest of the world is increasingly managing their currencies against CNY. China has thus introduced a destabilizing reflexivity in currency markets: in a new basket-based world, USD strength in the rest of the world should now drive USD/CNY higher, which would likely spillover into even greater USD strength elsewhere as markets panic. China's basket is thus a potential magnification mechanism for USD strength and higher correlations, and completes the circle in a way on competitive depreciation pressures.
While we continue to see upside potential in the USD/RMB complex, it has become difficult to trade. Elevated carry with front-end forwards still costing near 10%, and high policy volatility, have reduced the risk-reward. This favors positioning more through proxy trades such as KRW and TWD, which have added idiosyncratic drivers of weakness, and are exposed to both extremes of the USD smile. In a risk-off world driven by CNY weakness, these currencies will suffer by association. If however, we enter a relative period of calm for China, then the focus could shift back to the Fed, where strong employment data appears inconsistent with market pricing less than a 40% chance of a March hike. Low-yielding currencies with central banks that are likely to lag the Fed like KRW, TWD, THB will be highly exposed in this instance too. These currencies are thus likely to struggle either because of their beta to China or because of compressing rate differentials against the US. Ultimately we feel Asian FX -- particularly those at the intersection of policy divergence and China contagion themes -- have nowhere to hide, with the cascading strength in this USD cycle now rotating to focus on the region. Buy the USD dip.

Article No. 283
20160112
2016-01-12 随手札记

20160112
 
Japan seeks submarines sale to Australia in first big weapons export in 70 years!!
昨晚美股跟着A股跌啊跌，直到最后一个小时突然拉起，还涨了一点点。现在中国的确有国际影响力了，但是美国还是老大，中国因素最多影响他一天。
 
 
RX = German 10yr bund futures.
Fly=butterfly
 
 
 
1.UST NY Trader: Like to be short 7s on the fly and will add this into supply this week
 
Treasuries bear steepened on Monday with 30s closing 4bps cheaper as US stocks/risk assets stabilized and renewed talk of an InBev mega issuance weighed on the long end.  Volumes were 120% of recent averages.
周一T熊陡，30s收低4bps，美股及风险资产走稳，长端受压于InBev （英博啤酒集团）大量发行。
The sell-off got underway during the overnight session (mostly from the London open as Tokyo was closed for coming-of-age day) as early talk of a $50-60bn InBev issuance re-emerged with the announcement of banks for their investor call.  The market now expects this deal to hit the tapes sometime in the next several days.  A deal of this size is likely to be rate locked at some stage, so this, combined with some early set-up for this week's UST 10s & 30s supply kept the long end heavy through out the overnight and NY sessions, and drove 5/30s to close 3.2bps steeper.  
隔夜时段抛盘汹涌（主要是伦敦交易时间，日本假日），传言InBev要发50-60bn的消息再度出来，各家银行都在发动客户。市场预计这笔交易影响要持续未来几天。这种规模的交易有可能锁定票面利率，那么合并早些时候发布的10s和30st新发行消息导致长端受压，驱动5/30s收陡3.2bps
 
This long end activity allowing the market to shrug off a 5% slide in CSI 300.  The new Ultra 10yr future was launched on Monday, but naturally it will take time to gain popularity - we like to be short 7s on the fly （蝶式期权组合？）to take advantage of the eventual shift in activity from TY to the Ultra 10yr.  
长端走势使得市场拜托了A股跌5%的阴影。新的tn周一挂牌，自然要慢慢获得市场认可——我们想空7s，利用一下交易人们从ty迁移到tn的机会做一波。（7s即将成为off-the-run，而整个2016年内各家机构都比较认可流动性溢价）
 
We remain in 5/30s flatteners as a medium term trade.  We'll look for an opportunity to add to this trade into this week's 10s&30s supply, and potential InBev deal.
 
我们维持5/30s走平作为中期策略。我们还寻求通过本周10s/30s和InBev新发来加仓这种策略。
 
2.Crude oil model update - 1998 oil crisis redux and UST thoughts
 
Quick update of our long term crude oil model (calibrated over a 25-year sample) to put things in perspective. The model provides a fair value estimate of crude oil WTI or Brent given the dynamics of the global output gap (estimated from global industrial production series, to capture global demand), of the US dollar TWI, and of the expected global oil supply as % of GDP of oil importers. The model suggests that, over the past couple of months, oil prices have decoupled dramatically from fair value estimates implied by fundamentals by dropping sharply relative to the theoretical decline implied by the US dollar appreciation or by the poor supply/ demand dynamics (see chart below). Model currently suggests that crude oil WTI is excessively cheap by ~60% against long term fair value estimates around $50-55.  In comparison a similar model for industrial metal prices show them to be at fair value against fundamentals and the US dollar.
快速更新我们的长期油价走势预测模型（基于25年的样本数据），将各个因素分解来看。该模型估计的wti或brent原油的公允价值基于下面几项决定因素：全球产出缺口（由全球工业产能序列估算而来，推算全球需求），美元贸易加权指数（TWI）以及预计全球原油供应占进口国GDP的百分比。该模型表明在过去几个月中，油价显著脱离了这些重要基本面决定的公允价值，相对于因美元走强而走弱的趋势进一步剧烈下跌。模型估计现在油价可能较长期公允价值50-55$便宜了约60%.用类似模型来分析工业金属价格，他们则是处在基本面和美元（购买力）决定的公允价值附近（不搞死老毛子不算完啊）。
 
Last time we observed this type of dislocation between market oil price and the long term fair value estimate was at the end of 1998 in the aftermath of the Asian and Russian crisis, as the front end of the US rates market was sell-off to price in the upcoming Fed rate hike cycle. At the time crude oil prices had suddenly deviated by ~75% relative to fair value before recovering fully over the course of 1999. If history is any guide, there would be another ~15% round of correction on crude oil (i.e. towards $26) to match the type of overeaction seen during the 1998 crisis.
 
上次观察到类似现象时1998年年末亚洲和俄罗斯危机（俄债违约继而苏东...）之后，和美国利率市场暴跌迎接fed加息周期（实际上这个加息周期不存在）之前。那会儿，原油价格突然偏离fv-75%，花费了1999全年才全部恢复。如果历史可以参考，比照98危机那种反应油价还会跌15%（朝着26$）
From a positioning perspective, even though there has been a continuous reduction in net long speculative positions in crude oil WTI futures contract over the past few weeks, the 2M or 3M change in positioning (as of last Tuesday) has been mild and does not represent for now a reversal signal.
从仓位的角度看，尽管过去几周内wti期货投机性净多头持续下降，2m或3m的仓位变化（如周二）还是温和的，并不能意味着现在出现了反转信号。
 
Interestingly the latest decline in crude oil prices has had a particularly subdued impact on the risk premium embedded in the US Treasury curve (no more compression of the term premium, see the disclocation below between crude oil and the UST term premium, proxied as the residual of the UST 5s10s slope against the 2y rate to remove the impact of the monetary policy cycle).  This is likely a symptom of the strong selling of FX reserves (which creates bear steepening pressures). This interpretation would be consistent with the strong tightening pressure on US swap spreads. 
有意思的是近期油价下跌对于ust曲线的风险溢价影响着实有限（对于期限溢价没有压力，..？原文）。这可能意味着FX储备的大量抛盘（导致走陡压力）。这种解读比较符合近期us互换点差强力收窄的现象。
 
Finally we would argue that speculative positioning across UST futures shows crowded positions into 5s10s flatteners, which sends a strong contrarian signal for steepening pressures. The magnitude of the accumulation of flatteners over the past couple of months is a 2.5 sigma event (See charts below).
最后我们想讨论一下各期限UST期货投机性头寸都聚集在5/10走平上，对于当下走陡的作用力越来越强。在过去几个月中走平头寸的累积大概是2.5sigma（？方差？）
 
3. J LaVorgna -> What do the JOLTS data tell us about wage inflation? 11 January 2016 (1 page/ 239 kb)
ttp://pull.db-gmresearch.com/p/2073-504E/87313015/DB_USEconDly_2016-01-11_0900b8c08aa56267.pdf 
The job openings and labor turnover survey (JOLTS) data are among Fed Chair Yellen's favorite series, and we expect the figures to show gradual ongoing improvement. This is because they are derived from the Establishment Survey, which is used to construct nonfarm payrolls. However, the JOLTS are released with a one-month lag, meaning today's report corresponds to November, which was a strong month for hiring (252k). Investors should focus on three series within the JOLTS. They are the job openings rate, the hiring rate and the quits rate. 
新增工作岗位和劳动力迁徙（JOLTS,也称美国各行业工作机会总数）数据是耶伦大婶的最爱之一，我们也预测这个数字持续改善。这是因为该数据加工自nfp同一个调查。但是JOLTS数据发布有一个月的滞后，意味着今晚的数据其实是11月的，而那个月nfp很强（252k，修正了）。投资者应关注其三个组成部分，新增岗位率，雇佣率和辞职率。
The rate of job openings has improved the most among the aforementioned series. Job openings bottomed at 1.6% in July 2009 and then rose to a cyclical high of 3.7% last September. The hiring and quits rates have also improved, although not to the same extent. The hiring rate troughed in June 2009 at 2.8% and has since increased to 3.6%, a tenth below its cyclical peak of 3.7%, which was reached last June. The quits rate has been steady at 1.9% since last April, down from its cyclical high of 2.0% in the prior month. In Yellen's view, the quits rate is an indication of rising worker confidence about the labor market. This is perhaps one reason why the quits rate has historically been a leading indicator of wage inflation. As the chart below shows, the quits rate leads the year-over-year trend in average hourly earnings growth (production & nonsupervisory workers) by six quarters. This makes sense because presumably workers would not be quitting their jobs unless they had better income prospects elsewhere. For a more detailed discussion of the outlook for wage inflation, please see the latest US Economics Weekly. 
其中，新增岗位率改善最显著。该序列2009年7月触底1.6%，上个9月涨至景气周期3.7%高点。雇佣率和辞职率也有所改善，尽管幅度没有这么大。雇佣率09年6月是2.8%，之后增至3.6%，比上个六月达到的景气高点3.7%低十分之一个百分点。辞职率自上个4月之后稳定在1.9%，从上个三月的景气高点2.0%有所回落。这可能是辞职率成为工资性通胀的一个原因。如下图，辞职率领先平均每小时工资（制造业和非监工型个人）增长六个季度。假设工人总是在有更好的工作机会时辞职的话就有道理了。关于工资通胀的更详细讨论，请看每周美国经济述评。
With the U-6 unemployment rate, the most comprehensive measure of labor market slack, now below its previous-cycle peak, and the U-3 unemployment rate very close to the Fed's estimate of full employment (4.9%), the inflation-related data are likely to take on greater importance. Policymakers have yet to see firm evidence of Phillips-curve dynamics in the labor market. However, they continue to expect the historical relationship between unemployment and inflation to eventually reassert itself. Hence, they have been steadily lowering their estimate of full employment. If the ongoing tightening of the labor market puts upward pressure on the hiring and quits rates, they may become more confident that a meaningful increase in wage inflation is imminent. Absent such a development, however, investors might worry that the consistent underperformance of wage growth will prove to be another headwind to growth and inflation. If the Phillips curve (or any of its variants) is to remain a useful tool for monetary policymakers, who are betting that core inflation will move back toward their 2% target, then wage pressures must soon build. 
U6失业率，美国劳动力市场最综合性度量指标，现在位于前一个周期峰值直线，u3失业率则非常接近于fed全面就业指标（4.9%，没有找到），这些通胀相关指标的重要性可能进一步加强。决策者在劳动力市场尚未见到菲利普斯曲线的强力证明，但是他们继续期望失业率和通胀的历史相关性最终会确认这一现象。那么，他们就会不断调降充分就业估计。如果劳动力市场持续供应吃紧推高雇佣率和辞职率，他们会更加有信心相信工资性通胀显著增长迅速到来。但是没有这个发展的话（劳动力供应紧张导致的工资上涨），投资者则会担心工资增长弱于预期反过来会困扰经济增长和通胀。如果菲利普斯曲线对那些押注核心通胀会重返2%目标的决策者还是个有用的工具的话，工资压力必须很快显现（即工资要涨！）
 
先前日期11/30/2015

Nfp这么好，为什么收益率还跌了呢？又有什么新故事了？加息过快导致em的turmoil？
Cny-cnh差价可否视为风险厌恶度指标呢？“China market ascelate the global volatility”
S&P rallied before selling off in last hr of trading as China concerns trumped the jobs report; index ended 1.1% lower
Treasury yields fell across curve as mkts focused on stagnant U.S. wages;
The market anyway cares more about China than the US econ.
FED‘s focus has shifted to inflation rather than job growth._subcomponent of NFP

X总还在扔扔扔..
沙特声称盯住美元的汇率政策市misperception！这个除了石油神马都要进口的国家会加入竞争性贬值的队伍吗？敢吗？
 
1.us session
 
——BC
Overview: The NFP number printed above expectations with a 292k vs 200k.However the AHE was slightly disappointing coming in 0 vs a .2% rise. Like last NFP, the reaction was a quick bear flattener followed by a bull steepening led by the belly. As with the rest of this week, the rally was led by the belly in 5s and 7s as 2s5s flattened again down below 62bps and 5s30s steepened to further highs of 135bps.  There seemed to be bouts of short covering, though we did trade up partly following the stock market.
概述：nfp超预期至292kvs200k。但是AHE（平均每小时工资）差强人意0vs 0.2%。像上次nfp，市场迅速反应熊平，随即在中段领涨下牛陡。就像本周后半段，主要由5s7s领涨且2s5s走平至62bps以下，5s30s陡至135bps高位。看起来有不少空头回补，尽管我们的确随着股市部分买入了一些（短端）。
 
Flows: There was more selling on the front end, buying of the belly from domestic real money (fast money selling), and real money two-way in the long end with notable accounts selling. In curve, we saw on balance more flatteners from our account base. Going into next week we think the market will likely stay still rich/could rally further, and auction cycle could put further steepening pressure. Also notable is TN which starts trading on Monday.
客盘：前段卖多，国内真钱买（快钱卖）在中段，真钱在长端买卖互相，但有重量级账户在卖。曲线上，我们从我们账户出发看到买卖基本均衡，走平头寸掠夺。下周呢，我们想市场还会往上走，拍卖周期会进一步导致走陡。值得一提的还有tn（10年期国债期权）下周一开始交易了。

 5s    1.565  -3.9 bps

2.
 
Conclusion
 
The market was not buying the NFP story today and now is concerned that there will be a sharp slowing in NFP in Q2 but also the poor productivity and narrowing profit  margins. Usdcnh saw decent turnover in narrow ranges and there is still concern about a sharp depreciation in CNY ahead but the weakness in the usd today will help ease the pressure.  Would be cutting eurusd short above 1.10.
市场对NFP惊喜并不买账，其实是在担心q2的nfp会不会急剧下降，也担心工业产出和利润紧缩。Usdcnh窄幅内有大量还手，可以预计cny还会大幅贬值，但是现在usd走弱有助于缓解这种贬值压力。在1.10上方止损eurusd空头。
So the afternoon debate is whether the weekend will be a circuit breaker positive or Monday fears. CNH has settled under 6.70 and RRR cut should not matter. S&P daily  ranges in 2016 running are 1.9 pct. Much higher than 2015 but well shy of 2008 and 2009 levels. There is increasing talk of a H2 recession in the US and curious that US homebuilders are now 19 pct off their highs compared to 10 pct for the S&P. the DXY is  now down on the year but the usd is up against EM currencies. China should cut their RRR aggressively this weekend and we shall see what next week brings.  So the view remains S&P under
1800 in H1 and remember, even in 2008, equities rallied 50 pct of days.
那么这个下午的讨论就是周末是否会熔断，周一会怎么走。Cnh已经到6.70了，降准也没用了。Spx在2016的日均振幅为1.9，比2015高很多，但是低于08和09水平。关于美国下半年衰退的讨论越来越多了，住宅建筑商的股票已经跌了19%而spx跌10%、dxy也下跌，但美元对新兴市场货币是上涨的。中国应该这个周末降准，我们就能看看下周能怎么着吧。我们维持spx在上半年不超过1800，要记住即使在2008，股票也有50%的日子是上涨的。
 
3.12月NFP结构解读——非常重要！
 
 
-December nonfarm payrolls rose a much better-than-expected 292k after the prior two months were revised up by a net 50k. For Q4, nonfarm payroll gains averaged 284k, which was the strongest pace of hiring since the three months ending last January.
12月nfp超预期292看，前两月上修净50k。Q4.nfp均值284k，为去年1月开始的连续三个月间隔中最高值。
-Within the details of the Establishment Survey, construction hiring continued at a relatively brisk pace (45k vs. 48k previously). The rebound in professional and business services (73k vs. 21k) was aided by a 34k gain in temp hires (vs. -12k previously). Despite a weak ISM report, the manufacturing sector (8k vs. 2k) added the most jobs since last July (11k). Government sector hiring (17k vs. 12k) posted its largest gain since last August (28k).
分解看，建筑业雇佣微涨（45kvs48k前值）。专业和商务服务业反弹（73kvs21k）缘由34k临时雇佣（前值是-12k）。不考虑ism疲弱，制造业是从上个7月（11k）以来最大增幅（8kvs2k）。政府部门雇佣（17kvs12k）也是自上个8月以来最大增幅。
 
-The only sector that appeared to underperform was retail trade (4k vs. 32k), which likely reflects the fact that firms boosted holiday hiring earlier this season.
唯一不如意的就是零售（4kvs32k），可能反映出商家提前于12月雇人发起促销。
-The one modest weak spot in the report was average hourly earnings (Unch. vs. +0.2%). While the year-over-year growth rate jumped up to 2.5%, a cyclical high, this was due to an easy comparison as earnings fell -0.2% last December. Next month, when the comparison is up against January 2015’s large 0.6% increase, the year-over-year growth rate will likely retrace accordingly. Average weekly hours were unchanged at 34.5, which, coupled with the large payroll gain, meant that aggregate hours increased 0.3% versus a -0.1% decrease in the prior month.
温和走弱的是ahe（不变vs0.2%）。年化增长跳涨至2.5%，景气周期高点，因为去年12月是跌-0.2%。下个月，当和2015年1月涨了足足0.6%比较时，年化增长就要相应下跌了。AWH不变为34.5，结合nfp增长，意味着总计工作小时增加了0.3%vs前月-0.1%。
-For Q4, private sector income growth was up a solid 4.5% annualized.
Q4，私人部门收入增长年化4.5%
-The unemployment rate was unchanged at 5.0% as Household employment rose by a substantial 485k, the largest gain since last January (665k). Unemployment fell 20k. This had the effect of raising the labor force participation rate a tenth to 62.6%.
失业率不变为5.0%，家政服务显著增加485k，自上个1月（665k）最大增幅。失业人数减20k，导致劳动参与率增加十分之一百分点到62.6%。
 
-The measures of labor force slack that the Fed follows were on balance steady. The U-6 rate remained at 9.9%, and the ratio of part-time workers (non-agricultural industries) for economic reasons to the size of the labor force decreased slightly (3.7% vs. 3.8%). Long-term unemployment (as a percentage of total unemployment) rose slightly (26.3% vs. 25.7%) from last month’s post-recession low.
Fed认可的劳动力潜力指标也是稳定的。U6（此失业率衡量指标包括失业总人数另加全部准待业人数，再加上基于经济原因而从事兼职工作的就业总人数，以占民间劳动力加全部准待业人数的百分比表示。（准待业人士是指目前没有工作也没有主动寻找工作，但表示希望并能够就业，且于过去12个月某段时间内曾主动寻找工作的人士。基于经济原因而从事兼职工作的就业人士是指希望并能够从事全职工作但只能找到兼职工作的人士。））为9.9%，因经济原因兼职就业人员微降（3.7%vs3.8%）。长期失业率（失业率的一部分）（26.3%vs25.7%）较上月危机后低点微涨。
 
 
-With respect to the Fed, the solid December employment report keeps policymakers on track to raise rates again in March, financial conditions permitting of course. However, strong hiring alongside weak GDP growth points to further margin compression. And, remember, employment is not a leading indicator of the economy.
我们尊重fed（鬼才信！），12月强劲数字使得政策制定者们再次走到三月加息的康庄大道上，金融状况当然也是允许的。但是强劲的就业和弱GDP增长一起就导致了边缘眼里。而且，就业可不是经济的先行指标啊
 
http://pull.db-gmresearch.com/p/2370-490B/54893406/DB_DataFlash_2016-01-08_0900b8c08aa21871.pdf
 
4.Saravelos: Quick thoughts on NFP
 
 
GEORGE SARAVELOS:   On payrolls if you look at Fed funds pricing we are now only pricing 1 and a half Fed rate hikes for this year. Even a payrolls print of say 150k would not be weak enough to disrupt what is already very dovish pricing. 
从就业指标来看，如果你看看ff概率只是定价了1-1.5次年内加息。即便是150k的读数也不足以颠覆已经非常鸽派的定价。
Big picture, a couple of other points worth making on payrolls
 
(i)Good payrolls is bad for risk. Wrote about this last year, but the US faces a massive productivity problem and we need payrolls to slow down given sluggish GDP. If we get a decline in the u-rate to a 4 handle today it would be a disaster for risk because we keep eating away at capacity forcing a hawkish Fed without generating growth
好的nfp对风险资产不是好小事。去年是这么写的，但美国面临着大量的产能问题，在gdp走弱后我们需要nfp走弱。如果今天失业率到了4左右，现在风险资产就是灾难了，因为我们没有了在不促进增长条件下，任何能够抗衡鹰派fed武器
(ii)The bigger focus is of course China, and market is of the view that developments there will eventually overtake Fed thinking on the economy and pace of rate hikes. So as wrote above, unless we get huge surprise doubt payrolls will be tradeable and focus on Monday will again turn back east.
最大焦点当然还是中国，市场认为发展问题将最终取代fed是如何考虑经济发展和如何设定加息步奏的。如上述，除非我们能够将对nfp质疑转换为交易题材，否则周一的焦点还是在东方。
 
 
5.Torsten Slok -> The missing link for wages?——我个人超级同意，毕竟劳动参与率再回升
 
Maybe the reason why we are seeing limited wage pressure is because the people who are outside the labor force are starting to come back into the labor market and are thereby holding wages down, see the chart below. From 2009 to 2013, the share of people outside the labor force who found a job each month was essentially flat, but starting in 2014, the percentage of people outside the labor force who found a job each month suddenly started trending higher. This goes against the idea that people who are outside the labor market have lost their skills and are not coming back. The bottom line is that if the current uptrend in the chart continues then it means that we can continue to have nonfarm payrolls at 200k to 300k but with limited wage pressure. Or put differently, maybe there is more slack in the labor market, and as a result, the Fed will not be in a hurry to raise rates this year. This would be the sweet spot for equities and IG and HY. The next piece of this puzzle is the release of the Employment Cost Index on January 29.
之所以只会有很少的工资压力可能是劳动力大军之外的那些人正在开始找工作，使得工作有所压降，看下图。从2009到2013，劳动力大军之外的每月找到工作的份额是基本上走平的。但是从2014年开始，这个比例突然增加了。这有悖于自愿失业人口已经失去劳动技能，不会回来的设定。底线就是如果当前的上升趋势能够持续，nfp就能持续在200k到300k之间，还没啥工资压力。换句话说，就业市场潜力还很大，那么fed就没必要着急加息了，这对股市债市都好。这个谜团的下一线索是1月29日发布的雇佣成本指数（美国雇佣总成本 - 民间行业工人经季调（季环比），雇佣成本指数衡量员工薪酬成本（或劳动力成本）的变动。这些成本包括直接成本（例如薪资、奖金或实物福利）以及间接成本（例如社保缴款、培训费用、医疗给付、税款等等。））。
 
6.EL-ERIAN -> China will learn from these three surprising and uncharacteristi-看看吧，就当是他山之石
 
China will learn from these three surprising and uncharacteristic missteps
 
Mohamed El-Erian, 9 hours ago
{http://www.businessinsider.com/el-erian-china-had-3-policy-missteps-last-week-2016-1?IR=T&r=US&IR=T}
 
China had three – surprising and uncharacteristic – policy missteps last week that hurt the country’s credibility and contributed to financial instability in global markets.
 
Understanding why can shed light on what to expect going forward.
 
Policy Flip Flop: Admired for decades for possessing a clear long-term economic vision and applying consistent policies, Chinese officials made a very unusual and dramatic U-turn last week. They abruptly suspended circuit breakers that had been recently brought in to avert manic behavior in the stock market. To add to the exceptionalism of the episode, the initial design of these circuit breakers included trigger levels that were way too tight and, thus, turned out to be counter-productive.
 
Chasing an Unregulated Market: Known for decades for guiding market forces, Chinese officials gave the impression last week of being forced to frantically chase the offshore currency market that trades the Yuan. The more they depreciated the onshore rate in an attempt to close the exchange rate gap between the two markets, the greater the offshore segment moved away from them.
 
Poorly Communicating: Then there is the unusually bad communication. Long-term observers, both inside and outside China, have been scratching their heads at the government’s inability to explain its policy actions. In addition to aggravating general uncertainty, this raised questions as to whether officials see something bad that the rest does not as yet.
 
Some have attributed all this to policy incompetence. Some others have suggested internal political divisions that undermine policy incompetence. However, a much better explanation lies in the evolving policy challenges that China now faces given the additional steps it has taken to liberalize its financial system and internationalize its currency.
 
These evolving policy challenges are amplified by the unusually fluid global economy. And all this is in the context of China having to balance its long-standing domestic responsibilities with growing international ones.
 
This is not the first time that China slips on policies, though this time around the mishaps are much more visible given the country’s growing weight in the world economy and its systemic influence.
 
History suggests that officials there learn quite quickly. Indeed, over the years, they have displayed repeated eagerness to do so. The international system now has a much larger stake in history repeating itself.
 
 
7.本周前瞻
 
This week's data docket is back-loaded, with the bulk of economic reports released on Friday. There are only three data points between now and Friday. They are the November JOLTS (Tuesday), the Fed's beige book (Wednesday) and initial jobless claims (Thursday). While the JOLTS data correspond to November,
they are nonetheless noteworthy because they are closely followed by Fed Chair Yellen. The key  components of the report are the hiring and quits rates. Both are leading indicators of the trend in wage growth, an important focus for monetary policymakers fretting persistently low inflation.
本周数据集中在后半段，几个重量级数据都在周五。现在到周五就三个数据，分别是11月JOLTS(周二，美国各行业工作机会),fed黄皮书（周三）和初请（周四）。因jolts是11月数据，其构成成分就很重要，因为fed持续关注。关键是雇佣率和辞职率，都是工资变化趋势的先行指标，对于焦虑于低通胀的政策制定者们意义重大。
 
The hiring rate has held steady at 3.6% since last July, down a tenth from its cyclical high of 3.7%. This series remains below its 4% peak in the previous cycle, which coincided with 3%-plus wage growth. Similarly, the quits rate has been stuck at 1.9% since last April, which compares to a post-recession peak of
2.0% and a prior-cycle high of 2.3%. Further improvement in these series would add to policymakers' confidence that inflation will eventually firm toward their 2% target. As we discuss in more detail in the current US Economics Weekly, there is relatively little labor-cost pressure across an array of
industries. The Fed's beige book, which provides a qualitative assessment of the economy, is likely to reiterate that wage pressures, outside of a few high-skilled sectors such as technology, are "mostly contained" despite relatively low levels of unemployment.
上个7月以后，雇佣率稳定在3.6%，从景气高点3.7%降之分之一百分点。这个序列一直位于上个景气周期高点4%以下，对应于3%+的工资增长。类似的，辞职率从上个4月以来稳定在1.9，衰退后峰值为2.0%，上一个景气周期高点为2.3%。这些序列的进一步改善会增加政策制定者们关于通胀最终会回到2%政策目标的信心。正如我们在当下美国经济周评中多次讨论的那样，各个工业部门劳动力成本几乎无压力。Fed黄皮书将阐述经济总体的质量灵谷，有可能重申工资压力，除非是高度技能化岗位，都是”非常有限的“尽管失业率很低。
 
Regarding jobless claims, they are likely to remain near their current four-week moving average of 276k. These figures are notoriously unreliable this time of year given ever-shifting weather patterns and the difficulty of properly adjusting for the winter holidays. Still, as long as claims on a trend basis
remain comfortably below 300k, we can be reasonably confident that the labor market remains healthy. Over the last three months, nonfarm payroll gains have averaged 284k, the fastest pace since the three months ending January 2015 (318k). Despite this sturdy rate, investors should be reminded that employment is a coincident indicator of economic activity, i.e., the labor market generally grows in line with the overall economy. Consequently, we will be closely following leading indicators such as the various purchasing managers'surveys and measures of consumer confidence in the near term.
聊聊初请吧，可能还是在近四周移动均值276k左右。考虑到天气变幻莫测以及冬日假日干扰的难以处理，这个序列臭名昭著地不可靠。但是只要初请持续维持在300k以下，我们还是有理由相信劳动力市场是健康的。在上个三个月之内，nfp均值284k，是2015年1月以来连续三个月的最高值（318k）。不考虑这个序列的强劲，投资者应该了解这个序列与经济活动同步，比如劳动力市场与整体经济线性相关。那么，我们最好紧跟那些线性质保，像各种pmi啊，近期消费者信心之类。
With respect to Friday's data, retail sales are the main event, although the preliminary results of the University of Michigan consumer sentiment index are a close second because consumer confidence is vulnerable to a sharp drop in light of recent stock market weakness. Headline December retail sales are
expected to be flat following a 0.2% increase in November because of softer motor vehicle sales. Retail sales excluding autos (+0.2% forecast vs. +0.4% previously) should be modestly better but still somewhat disappointing. We expect consumer sentiment (88.0 vs. 92.6) to dip as the sharp fall in the stock
market offsets the upbeat news on the December employment situation. Other data on Friday include the January New York Fed Empire survey (-5.0 vs. -4.6),December industrial production (+0.2% vs. -0.6%) and capacity utilization(77.2% vs. 77.0%), and November business inventories (-0.3% vs. Unch.).
周末的数据嘛，零售最重要，尽管密歇根消费者信心指数最近预测值几乎是第二高了，但是这个序列对最近股市暴跌是很敏感的。12月零售数据预期较11月平稳增长0.2%因为机动车销售疲弱。除机动车销售（预期+0.2%vs0.4%前值）之外的零售会好一点，但还是多少有点儿令人失望。我们预期消费者信心（88.0 vs 92.6）会下降，因为暴跌的股市对冲了12月良好的就业数字。周五其他数据还有1月份纽约fed的帝国调查（-5.0vs-4.6）。12月工业产出（+0.2% vs -0.6%）和产能利用率（77.2% vs 77.0%）以及11月商业库存（-0.3% vs 不变）
 
While normally not a market-moving release, the inventory data are going to take on more significance in light of what we believe was a substantial liquidation of stockpiles last quarter. The expected inventory drawdown may subtract more than 150 basis points off Q4 2015 real GDP growth, which we
project at just 0.5%.
虽然对市场一贯没啥作用，在我们认为上个季度厂商大量去库存的北京下存货数据还是很有点儿意思的。预期存货会拖累2015q4GDP增长150bp，而我们预测2015q4增长只有0.5%
